author: Valente, Anne Marie and Cook, Stephen and Festa, Pierluigi and Ko, H Helen and Krishnamurthy, Rajesh and Taylor, Andrew M and Warnes, Carole A and Kreutzer, Jacqueline and Geva, Tal

title: Multimodality imaging guidelines for patients with repaired tetralogy of Fallot: a report from the American Society of Echocardiography: developed in collaboration with the Society for Cardiovascular Magnetic Resonance and the Society for Pediatric Radiology
